name: rectangle
description: Move and resize windows using keyboard shortcuts or snap areas
install_command: curl -L https://github.com/rxhanson/Rectangle/releases/download/v0.84/Rectangle0.84.dmg -o rectangle.dmg && hdiutil attach rectangle.dmg && cp -r '/Volumes/Rectangle 0.84/Rectangle.app' /Applications/ && hdiutil detach '/Volumes/Rectangle 0.84'
